title: New & MPfree: Lianne La Havas – Lost and Found (Slime Remix)
body:
I feel pretty smug whenever I hear a new cut from [**Slime**.](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/16170-new-slime-lean-over/ "New: Slime – Lean Over") Mostly because I’ve always heard them at least a few months before they drop, but secondly because I love **Will Archer** more than he’ll ever know.

OMG babe, if you’re reading this hit me up, we haven’t jammed in AGES.

Anyway, he’s only gone and remixed a track from mega sensation **Lianne La Havas**. It’s just what you’d expect from **Slime**, masterfully soulful, serene and bitterly somber, yet hopeful of what’s to come.

Hit play… Via [NTS](http://ntslive.co.uk/?p=12142)
